description: Expected scope labels for different Maven scope test scenarios

compileOnly.notes: guava has no explicit scope, so it defaults to 'compile' scope

mixedTransitive.notes: Transitive dependencies should inherit appropriate scopes

scopeDefinitions.compile: Default scope when no scope is specified. Available in all classpaths. Propagated to dependent projects.
scopeDefinitions.provided: Available only at compile time and test classpath. Not transitive.
scopeDefinitions.runtime: Not needed for compilation, but required at runtime. Available in runtime and test classpaths.
scopeDefinitions.test: Only available for test compilation and execution. Not transitive.
scopeDefinitions.system: Similar to provided but must provide explicit path to JAR. Not recommended.
scopeDefinitions.import: Only supported on dependency type 'pom' in dependencyManagement section.
